Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Tulasi 2023 14 inches Full HD Windows 11 Laptop Computer

Intel Celeron Quad-Core N4120
Enjoy this Windows laptop with a 10th generation Intel Gemini Lake Celeron N4120 Processor 4 Cores 4 Threads 4MB cache,
built-in Intel UHD Graphics 600, support 4K@60Hz. Experience entertainment features and fast connectivity

12GB RAM Laptop Sufficient Storage
12GB memory for advanced multitasking, smoothly run your applications. 256GB M.2 2280 SATA3 SSD fast boot-up time and data access,
no noise, enough space for you to store pictures, music, and videos. Save files faster and store more data

Pre-install Windows 11 Pro
Tulasi T Pro Laptop with Windows 11 Pro system, experience the security and increased responsiveness of Windows laptops,
it’s very suitable for business work, school study, and home entertainment.

Tulasi T Pro Laptop Technical Specifications:

CPU: Intel 4-Cores N4120 processor, 4M Cache, up to 2.60 GHz

GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 600, support 4K@60Hz

Memory: 12GB LPDDR4

Storage: M.2 SATA3 256GB SSD (expandable up to 1 TB)

Display: 14 inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS, 300 nits

Operating System: Pre-install Windows 11 Pro

Connectivity: 2.4G/5G WiFi support 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 4.2

Ports: 2 x USB3.0 ports, 1 x Mini HD, 1 x Micro SD slot, 1 x Headphone Jack, 1 x DC

Keyboard: Chocolate keyboard with lift design

Webcam: 0.3M camera and dual array digital microphones

Battery: 34.2Wh Polymer lithium-ion battery, up to 6 hours

Color: Space gray

Dimensions: 12.8*8.3*0.37 – 0.65inch / 325*212*9.5 – 16.5mm

Weight: 2.88lb / 1.3kg

What’s in the box: Tulasi T Pro Laptop x 1, Power Adapter x 1
[ ULTRA THIN AND PORTABLE ] – This computer laptop is only 0.37 to 0.65 inch thin and lightweighs only 2.88 lb, it’s easy to take this laptop pc anywhere, It also gets an 34.2Wh high-capacity battery that can last up to 6 hours long battery life.
[ RELIABLE PERFORMANCE ] – Tackle your daily tasks easily and quickly with the performance of a Intel Gemini Lake Quad-Core Processor, 4M cache, Base Frequency 1.1 GHz Burst Frequency 2.60 GHz, built-in Intel UHD Graphics 600, Support 4K@60Hz.
[ 12GB RAM + 256GB SSD ] – 12GB LPDDR4 RAM for advanced multitasking, smoothly run your programs, and browser tabs. with 256GB M.2 SATA3 SSD storage, experience 3x faster data transfer performance than a traditional eMMC hard drive, faster boot time.
[ 14 INCHES LAPTOP WINDOWS 11 ] – It comes with Windows 11 Pro system, new look and feel, maximize your productivity, with a 14 inches micro-edge Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS screen, you can enjoy clear, bright and vivid picture.
[ CONVENIENCE AND WARRANTY ] – Experience smooth wireless connection with 802.11.ac 2.4G/5G WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2. Rich-ports include 2 USB 3.0, Mini HD, DC Charging, Audio jack, Micro SD slot. All Tulasi laptops come with a 1-year warranty, you can enjoy it.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $249.99 - $219.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:32:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The CT-2860 delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors with crystal clear, sharp 720p resolution on a 28-inch LED HDTV. There is a TV Stand included.

1 A Perfect Fit 2 Unmatched Support 3 Stunning Audio & Video 4 Enjoy the Action! 5 Multiple Connections

VESA Wall Mount Pattern and TV Dimensions

This TV has a Universal VESA Pattern of 100×100 which is one of the most common patterns, meaning it will fit most TV Wall Mounts that are manufactured.

VESA is a universally known measurement of TV mounts used with most TV companies around the world.A VESA hole pattern is measured in both horizontal and vertical distance between mounting holes.

For example, VESA 100 x 100 means your TV mounting holes are 100mm apart horizontally and 100mm apart vertically.

Specifications

Screen Size 28″ Display Resolution 1366 x 768 TV and Stand (WxHxD) 22.8 x 17.2 x 7.1” TV w/o Stand (WxHxD) 25.5 x 15.4 x 2.8” Viewing Angle 178° x 178° Response Time 8ms Broadcast System NTSC/ATSC/QAM Max Audio Output 2 x 8 W VESA Standard 100 x 100 mm Power Supply AC 100-240V 60Hz Power Consumption <45 W Weight 10.3 lbs. USB File Play Allows guests to play MP3 and view JPG files, as well as charge mobile devices

VESA WALL MOUNT READY – The compact, lightweight design makes it quick and easy to mount on your wall. The VESA pattern on this TV is 100×100 which is one of the most common VESA patterns, meaning it will easily fit with most wall mounts you can purchase today. You can also check out our full range of wall mounts by visiting our store.
STUNNING VIDEO AND AUDIO – Enjoy your favorite movies, shows and sports on the 28 inch, 720p, 60Hz LED Television screen which delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors. Pairing with the clarity of the screen is the stunning audio through our state-of-the-art, built-in speakers. Entertainment at the touch of a button!
FULL FUNCTION REMOTE – Control your Television on one simple-to-use remote control. Batteries Included. Easily programmable to any universal remote you may have.
UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SERVICE – Backed by the Continu.us 1 year warranty, our friendly technical support team is always here to help you. Our offices are in the USA in Eastern Time, and you can reach out to us through phone or email.

NITAGUT is a store that specializes in men’s fashion.Focus on creating trendy, casual,classic and excellent men’s clothing!

We use American sizes and buyers can buy them with correct size.

And our clothes are mostly made of excellent fabrics.

We bring happiness and sunshine in life to men who pursue comfortable and fashion！

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.35 x 7.24 x 0.39 inches; 1.13 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 14, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B099DNBMYT

Imported
Machine Wash
NITAGUT Mens Shawl Collar Pullover Sweater is made of high quality fabric,The fabric is comfortable and stretchy ,so the stylish sweaters will provide a soft and warm wearing experience in cold weather and make you look elegant and casual!
The Cable Knit sweater for man is in US size. it’s very well made and will fit you perfectly.The casual sweater has a V-neck design,It also has Shawl Collar, Cable knit, Ribbed cuffs and hem, and Button decoration. The structure of the sweater itself is very good. There are no loose seams or uneven seams and the sweaters are woven with beautiful symmetrical patterns which will keep you getting compliments constantly!
Our v-neck soft pullover sweater is suitable for spring, autumn and winter ,It’s also a great addition to daily,business, work, party, dating, street strolling,travelling, sporting, skating,Halloween costume or any other leisure occasions. The long sleeve sweater for men can be a wonderful and considerate winter gift for your father, boyfriends,husband,son or your friends!
The Stylish Pullover sweater looks great with many daily dress.It can be paired with jeans to create a smart leisure look, or layer with jackets or coats to keep warm in cold days.Of course sports pants, casual pants, T-shirts and hoodies can also be perfectly matched with this sweater.This Cable Knit sweater comes in many colors, which also allows you to match all kinds of clothes you like!
In order to protect the fabric and to keep the the sweater comfortable,you can take the following ways to wash your sweater：dry clean or hand wash or Machine wash in Laundry Bag.After that,It’s better to lay the sweater flat to dry.Please don’t bleach and avoid putting this into the dryer after washing. otherwise the sweater may not keep its shape.Due to computer image resolution and monitor settings, the color may vary slightly depending on the website.thank you for your understanding!

Wangdo Men’s Zipper Pockets Joggers Pants – Casual Gym Workout Track Pants Comfortable Slim Fit Tapered Sweatpants
======= Size Chart ======
US S  :  Waist 29.5″-29.9″ —- Length 40.6″-41.3″
US M  :  Waist 30.3″-30.7″ —- Length 41.3″-42.1″
US L   :  Waist 31.1″-31.5″ —- Length 42.1″-42.9″
US XL  :  Waist 31.9″-32.3″ —- Length 42.9″-43.7″
US XXL :  Waist 32.7″-33.1″ —- Length 43.7″-44.5″
Note : If you want to be looser, choose a size larger than usual!
======= Design =========
Stretch Fit: Premium comfortable elastic material to ensure the maximum breathable and flexibility for your moving.
Elastic Waist: Elastic waistband with adjustable internal drawstring for comfortable fit and keep you jogging sweatpants from sliding down.
Tapered leg: Tapered leg design with elastic cuff to better show your body shape. 
Arc Fit: Arc fit insures the garment id tight in the right places to compliment any physique.
======= Suitable For =====
gym, leisure, home, outdoor, sports like running, workout, fitness, training, jogging, basketball, fishing, baseball, hiking, bodybuilding, dancing etc.
 
Return Policy: We know your concerns! Wangdo provides you worry-free return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with your joggers, either size or color, please feel free to contact us. We will try our best to provide you happy purchasing experience by exchanging or refund easily.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 1, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09TNBWT27

Drawstring closure
Machine Wash
【COMFORTABLE MATERIAL】 These joggers pants made of Cotton -polyester,Soft fabric, comfortable tailored fit. If you like to be looser, please choose next size.
【TWO DEEP ZIPPER POCKETS】 Two side pockets are deep enough for storage (phone,keys,or small items) prevent your belongings from falling out when you are doing exercise.
【ELASTIC WAISTBAND WITH DRAWSTRING】 With adjustable internal drawstring design on the jogging trousers, you can adjust the waist size to be tighten or loosen according to your own need which provide you comfortable feeling and prevent it loosing.
【VERSATILE WORKOUT PANTS】 Suitable for gym, leisure, home, outdoor, sports like running, workout, fitness, training, jogging, basketball, fishing, baseball, hiking, bodybuilding, dancing etc.
【EASY CARE】 Fade, shrink, and wrinkle resistant; Track pants are quick dry and machine washable.
